RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 20 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLO NGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELLE BREZING pressed up to threaten on the turn losing ground to upper stretch appearing to be hanging past mid track finding a final surge to get up on the wire. CURIOSITY KILLS pressed up to duel on the turn into upper stretch extending lane missing between horses on the wire. ADULTING sent c;lear was hooked on the turn battling from the inside down the lane proving tenacious in defeat. KITTEN BY THE SEA raced a step slow through the turn entering the picture after the fact. LADY NOGUEZ was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Noguez
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Gordiano Racing Stable and Ayon Moreno Miguel

ENTRY.NAME: Belle Brezing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up turn, hanging wide lane, found final surge

ENTRY.NAME: Curiosity Kills
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on the turn, dueled near mid track lane, right there wire

ENTRY.NAME: Adulting
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, hooked turn, dueled inside lane, battled to the end

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 20 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVILS RED cleared on the turn being hand ridden near mid track down the lane winning as much the best. CHEEKY CHAPS pressed early then chased through the turn into upper stretch proving a clear second best. ZERO FOR CONDUCT raced evenly through the turn tiring down the lane. HARTEL was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Devils Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared on turn, hand ridden near mid track lane, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Cheeky Chaps
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased to lane, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 38. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PORTIA'S HOPE surged clear along the rail on the turn drawing off in upper stretch widening under a hand ride. TRACE ESTATE raced evenly giving a mild rally late to get up for place. S S CASINO GIRL led early being passed from the inside on the turn chasing in upper stretch weakening late. BABY BONNIE was always outrun. D'FUNNY GIRL pressed early then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Trace Estate
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, mild rally lane, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Portia's Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged clear inside turn, drew off lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: S S Casino Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, pased from inside turn, chased lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners at Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 to Carry 2lbs Additional For Each Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REJUVENATE quick to the lead held rivals at bay to wire. SKYLAS GOLD vying widest got up for place at wire. PERFECT GENTLEMAN gave game response between horses. SOMERSET BAY chased inside of rivals coming up a touch short. FREE SPEECH needed more.

ENTRY.NAME: Rejuvenate
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick break, held margin to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 20 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEAN THE HAMMER saved ground putting a head in front at the quarter pole drawing off from the rail in upper stretch being hand ridden to wire. FIFTY PESOS pressed bid on the turn being dispatched by the winner in upper stretch battling on late to secure place. VASY SAYS NYET led early then hooked from the inside at the quarter pole ceding into upper stretch weakening the final eighth. CAJUN BAYOU slow early was never involved passing a couple late. PITMAN fractious in the gate was off slow rushing to bid on the turn flattening out in upper stretch. VERRAZANO LEGACY flashed speed then faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Sean the Hammer
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, led 1/4 pole, drew off rail, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Vasy Says Nyet
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, hooked from inside 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Pitman
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, rushed on the turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Fifty Pesos
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, no match lane, secured place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 20 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Al lowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG TREAT engaged early dueling through the turn then down the stretch digging deep on the inside to prevail. ALWAYS MISCHIEVOUS away alertly pressed a breast rival throiugh the turn then down the stretch being out gamed at the end. FIRST IMPRESSION faded on the turn regrouping a bit down the lane finishing evenly. WICKED LUNA chased the pace wavering on the turn weakening down the lane. HIALEAH HOTTIE had little response.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Treat
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: engaged early, dueled inside throughout, dug deep to prevail

ENTRY.NAME: First Impression
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded turn, mild rally lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Hialeah Hottie
ENTRY.OWNER: Gordiano Racing Stable and Behrmann Elaine

ENTRY.NAME: Always Mischievous
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed narrow lead, dueled lane, out gamed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners at Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 to Carry 2lbs Additional For Each Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAN SHE SCOOT pressed a narow lead holding on under outside pressure at the wire. MS HEADLEY pressed up late just missing abreast foe. TEL AVIV pressed on the inside staying on to wire. LITTLE MISS CAT pressed from the inside coming up a bit short. RED ROCKET GIRL failed to menace. PROMINENT HENNY ducked out at the break.

ENTRY.NAME: Can She Scoot
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead, held on at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Headley
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up late, just missed abreast foe

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 20, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 20 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONOR LIFE pressed a narrow lead through the turn dueling abreast foe late holding on gamely. LAUTREC saved ground surging in upper stretch bidding gamely on the inside of rival. SUDDENLY SEDUCTIVE stalked the pace vying five wide in upper stretch closing late at mid track. MACHINIST pressured the pace dueling on the turn weakening the final eighth. CZECHMIGHT chased the pace through the turn weakening the final eighth. SAVAGE NATION hustled along through the turn came up short late. BOATSWAIN faded on the turn. RUM ON THE ROCKS was never involved. BULLION was always outrun. COLOMBARD was steadied at the start.

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, surged upper stretch, bid gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead, dueled abreast lane, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Suddenly Seductive
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 5 wide lane, closed late

ENTRY.NAME: Machinist
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, weakened lane
